definition: to glue to/to paste onto/to stick on/also written 粘貼|粘贴[zhan1 tie1]
sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip

sentences.english: You can change the size of the pasteboard in InDesign preferences.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過參數改變黏貼板的大小。

sentences.english: He glued his photograph into his passport.
sentences.chinese: 他把照片黏貼在護照上。

sentences.english: Some video cards are supplied with an adhesive clear protective film applied to the fan cowing.
sentences.chinese: 一些視頻卡提供的是保護膜黏貼明確適用於範鎮懾着。

sentences.english: He stuck the pages of his homework together and then handed them in to his professor.
sentences.chinese: 他把作業一頁頁地黏貼在一起，然後交給了老師。

sentences.english: Of course it's a Copy & Paste.
sentences.chinese: 當然這個遊戲是複製黏貼。

sentences.english: Paste the Search Results Code you just copied into the textarea.
sentences.chinese: 黏貼搜索結果代碼到文字域。

sentences.english: There was a lot of copying, pasting, transforming, and scaling.
sentences.chinese: 有許多的複製，黏貼，透明度的調整和縮放要去做。

definition: to stick/to affix/to adhere/to paste (as in "copy and paste")/Taiwan pr. [nian2 tie1]/also written 黏貼|黏贴[nian2 tie1]
to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
